My Calcs

  • {{hero.id}} {{hero.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CalcLine } from '../calc-line'; import { CalcLineService } from '../calc-line.service'; import { MessageService } from '../message.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-calcs-list', templateUrl: './calcs-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./calcs-list.component.css'] }) export class CalcsListComponent { constructor(private calcLineService: CalcLineService, private messageService: MessageService ) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getLines(); } getLines(): void { this.calcLineService.getAll() .subscribe(resp => this.lines = resp); } selectedLine? : CalcLine; onSelect(line: CalcLine): void { this.selectedLine = line; this.messageService.add(`CalcsListComponent: Selected line id=${line.id}`); } lines: CalcLine[] = []; }
